selectedVerses.text: And they will all come and settle in the steep ravines, and in the clefts of the rocks, and on all the thornbushes, and on all the pastures.
And the mountains will melt under him, and the valleys will split open, like wax before the fire, like waters poured down a steep place.
And he said to them, "Go." So they came out and went into the pigs, and behold, the whole herd rushed down the steep bank into the sea and drowned in the waters.
So he gave them permission. And the unclean spirits came out, and entered the pigs, and the herd, numbering about two thousand, rushed down the steep bank into the sea and were drowned in the sea.
Then the demons came out of the man and entered the pigs, and the herd rushed down the steep bank into the lake and were drowned.
